text: Iajuddin Ahmed (1 February 193110 December 2012) was a President of Bangladesh. He served as president from 6 September 2002 to 12 February 2009. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Presidents of Bangladesh Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:Politicians from Dhaka Division
title: Iajuddin Ahmed
